entry.content:

sad for Aang and I'm not sure I think it fits the characters, but
it makes sense.

entry.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender - Season 3 - Episode 46 - The Avatar and the Firelord
entry.content:
Avatar: The Last Airbender - Season 3 - Episode 46 - The Avatar and the Firelord20170509
It was neat to learn about the previous Avatar, but I felt like
the punchline was pointless... why exactly was he trying to stop
the volcano when his people were already safe (which, by the way,
he basically wasn't focused on helping anyways)? He had a stupid
death.
  • TV Shows
  • Avatar: The Last Airbender

entry.title: Game: Dark Souls: The Board Game (Board, 2017)
entry.content:
Game: Dark Souls: The Board Game (Board, 2017)20170507
My son and I played a round of this going against the
Gargoyles. It was pretty fun. I found my characters to be almost
totally useless against the enemies. It felt like there wasn't
enough strategy, just luck. I found the souls to be kind of
pointless, because you need to level up just to use equipment, but
the equipment isn't guaranteed to be any better (we pulled about
10 pieces and didn't get anything we could use or wanted.) I think
there should be less randomness to make a more Dark-Souls-like
experience. We had fun though and the minis were beautiful.

Total time: 2:00
  • Video Games
  • Dark Souls: The Board Game
  • Board
  • 2017

entry.title: Movie: Ballerina, starring Elle Fanning (2016)
entry.content:
Movie: Ballerina, starring Elle Fanning (2016)20170507

the boy's plot was pointless, but it was definitely very fun!

entry.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender - Season 2 - Episode 40 - The Crossroads of Destiny
entry.content:
Avatar: The Last Airbender - Season 2 - Episode 40 - The Crossroads of Destiny20170506
This was an intense episode! I liked the showdowns. I was
honestly surprised that Zuko didn't continue cooperating. I was
also very surprised that Aang was struck down, he didn't even get
to use his Avatar powers and there seemed to be no consequence
for "letting go" of Katara.
  • TV Shows
  • Avatar: The Last Airbender

entry.content:
Avatar: The Last Airbender - Season 3 - Episode 41 - The Awakening20170506

that the last season transition was such a big deal.
